name: conversations.inviteShared
desc: Sends an invitation to a Slack Connect channel

channel.desc: ID of the channel on your team that you'd like to share.

emails.desc: Optional email to receive this invite. Either `emails` or `user_ids` must be provided. Only one email or one user ID may be invited at a time.

external_limited.desc: Optional boolean on whether invite is to an external limited member. Defaults to `true`.

user_ids.desc: Optional user_id to receive this invite. Either `emails` or `user_ids` must be provided. Only one email or one user ID may be invited at a time.

errors.already_in_channel: User is already in the channel.
errors.cannot_share_cross_workspace_channel: You cannot share a cross-workspace or org-wide channel.
errors.cannot_share_mandatory_channel: You cannot share #general or mandatory channels.
errors.channel_archived: You cannot share an archived channel.
errors.channel_not_found: The channel provided was not found.
errors.connection_limit_exceeded: This channel has hit the limit of external connections.
errors.connection_limit_exceeded_pending: This channel already has a pending invite.
errors.invalid_channel_type: You cannot share MPDMs or DMs.
errors.invalid_email: At least one email address provided is invalid.
errors.invite_lookup_error: An error occurred while attempting to look for existing invites.
errors.invite_not_found: An error occurred while inviting users.
errors.legacy_connection_limit_exceeded: You cannot share a legacy ESC channel with a third team
errors.member_limit_exceeded: This channel that has hit the limit of members
errors.message_too_long: The provided message was longer than 560 characters.
errors.not_allowed_for_grid_workspace: This workspace does not have Slack Connect enabled.
errors.not_in_channel: The app is not a member of the channel to invite.
errors.not_owner: Only the host organization for a channel can request to share it.
errors.not_paid: This feature is only available to paid teams.
errors.ratelimit: The rate-limit for this method has been reached. The ratelimit is applied on a per-user basis when you pass the `emails` parameter.
errors.recipients_not_specified: Bots are required to specify which users to invite.
errors.restricted_action: A team preference does not allow this authorization to send invites.
errors.too_many_emails: Too many email recipients were passed in the `emails` parameter.
errors.no_external_invite_permission: User does not have permission to invite an external user.
